title: EPISODE 277: Murder in the Heartland, Nuclear Threats, & Ritualistic Child Sex Abuse
description:
After Jack Posobiec held North Dakota prosecutor Kara Brinster accountable last week, Brinster has finally filed murder charges against Shannon Brandt - the man who ran over the conservative teenager. In a scathing speech against the ‘satanic’ west, Putin threatened to use nuclear weapons against Ukraine; meanwhile, Zelensky applied to join NATO and requested the process be fast tracked. The commies over at the CCP have opened 32 international ‘police service centers’ around the world, including in the USA, with plans to expand their operational footprint even farther. A former therapist in Provo, Utah was arrested for ritualistic child sex abuse involving over 130 kids; he also claimed his ‘healing miracles’ could cure patients of homosexuality. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec

content:encoded:
